divs: Sighting DetailsWe had hunted Near Old Hopkins town all day.At first dark we were gathering up our deer hounds on South dud rd. and Mill rd.I noticed what appeared to be a jet plane on fire coming across swamp from south east to north west.It was moving fast it then turned toward me and suddenly stopped leaned side ways and went down in a clear cut.When it stopped lights (fire) seemed to drip off of it.I saw 6 lights ,heat vents come on as it stopped.It landed or crashed was my first thoughts.In less than 10 seconds it came back up hovered above the trees.At times we could only see a shere like orange fireball.Other times as it turned we could see the shape of a triangle.We watched for 2 hours and left not really understanding it. We went back the next night to get pictures to see if it might be their.It was in approximate area.We took pictures,but none would show up. This object was large as a house.It has been seen since many times and may still be in area. I don't think it's military,but i don't know what it is.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Manor
This sighting has never been favorited.
